about.intro: Innovative and driven Computer Science fresher with a passion for turning creative ideas into functional solutions. Eager to embark on a rewarding journey in iOS app development, I bring a strong foundation in app development and data analysis to the table. My dedication to continuous learning, problem-solving mindset, and commitment to excellence set the stage for my success in the dynamic field of mobile application development.
about.details: I have a proven track record of participating in hackathons and coding competitions, where I showcased my ability to think creatively and develop solutions under tight deadlines. This experience has honed my ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and collaborative environment.

services.title: iOS App Development
services.description: The most modern and high-quality design made at a professional level.

services.title: Flutter App Development
services.description: The robust and fast deployment across platforms like Android and iOS.

education.institution: Rajeev Gandhi Memorial College Of Engineering & Technology

experience.description: Working in iOS development as an app Developer.

testimonials.name: HealthPass (HSBC)
testimonials.review: Worked as an iOS Developer. Developed key features, integrated Deeplinks, and added UI & Unit test cases.

testimonials.name: SmartWait
testimonials.review: Worked as an iOS Developer. Implemented real-time queue management, improved user experience, and handled API integrations.

testimonials.name: Playdate
testimonials.review: Worked as an iOS Developer. Designed social engagement features, managed push notifications, and enhanced UI/UX.

testimonials.name: MRC
testimonials.review: Worked as an iOS Developer. Led the development of a secure messaging module, integrated third-party APIs, and ensured app stability.

testimonials.name: PaySlate
testimonials.review: Worked as a Flutter Developer. Built a cross-platform payment solution, implemented state management, and implemented the book sharing feature.

achievements.title: Best Hire Award
achievements.description: I was honored with the Best Hire Award for my exceptional performance, the adoption of new technologies, successful management of multiple projects, and the ability to foster a collaborative and team-oriented work environment.
